#
# Docker configuration for encrypted cloud file storage container
#
FROM ${image_from}
MAINTAINER Josh Hogle <josh.hogle@gmail.com>

# Versions
ENV CONTAINER_VERSION 1.1.0-2

# Upgrade packages and install required packages for build
RUN \
        apt-get update && \
	apt-get -y dist-upgrade && \
        apt-get -o Dpkg::Options::="--force-confold" --no-install-recommends -y install \
		git python3-setuptools python3-appdirs python3-dateutil python3-requests python3-sqlalchemy \
		python-fuse encfs python-software-properties software-properties-common && \
	easy_install3 -U pip

#############################################
# Amazon Cloud Drive Client Install
#############################################
RUN \
	pip3 install certifi && \
	pip3 install --upgrade git+https://github.com/yadayada/acd_cli.git

#############################################
# Google Drive FS Install
#############################################
RUN \
	add-apt-repository -y ppa:alessandro-strada/ppa && \
	apt-get update && \
	apt-get install google-drive-ocamlfuse && \
        rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*

#########################
# Customizations
#########################
# Add files to image
ADD files /

# Configure image
RUN \
	chmod 0755 /usr/local/sbin/*

# Mount configuration folders
VOLUME [ "/etc/mount.d", "/var/lib/acd", "/var/lib/gdrive" ]
